00032 bool CSpectral::FFTForward(CComplexImage &Img)
00033 {
00034 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00035         /* add comment to history */
00036         {
00037                 TString History;
00038                 k_InitString(&History);
00039                 k_SprintfString(&History,"%sCSpectral::FFTForward()",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00040                 Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00041                 k_EmptyString(&History);
00042                 k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00043         }
00044 #endif
00045         bool ReturnValue=k_FFT(1,Img.GetTComplexImagePtr());
00046         if (ReturnValue==false)
00047         {
00048                 ostringstream ost;
00049                 ost << "CSpectral::FFTForward() failed: Empty image or width/height not a power of 2" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00050                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00051 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00052                 /* remove the history line added above */
00053                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00054 #endif
00055     }
00056 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00057         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00058         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00059 #endif
00060     return ReturnValue;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool CSpectral::FFTInverse(CComplexImage &Img)
00064 {
00065 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00066         /* add comment to history */
00067         {
00068                 TString History;
00069                 k_InitString(&History);
00070                 k_SprintfString(&History,"%CSpectral::FFTInverse()",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00071                 Img.m_History.AppendIPL(History.pChars);
00072                 k_EmptyString(&History);
00073                 k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00074         }
00075 #endif
00076         bool ReturnValue=k_FFT(-1,Img.GetTComplexImagePtr());
00077         if (ReturnValue==false)
00078         {
00079                 ostringstream ost;
00080                 ost << "CSpectral::FFTInverse() failed: Empty image or width/height not a power of 2" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00081                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00082 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00083                 /* remove the history line added above */
00084                 Img.m_History.RemoveLastLine();
00085 #endif
00086     }
00087 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00088         /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00089         k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00090 #endif
00091     return ReturnValue;
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool CSpectral::DeriveCorrelation(const CStdImage &Lg,const CStdImage &Sm, CFloatImage &Dest)
00095 {
00096         if ((Lg.IsEmpty()==true) || (Sm.IsEmpty()==true))
00097         {
00098                 ostringstream ost;
00099                 ost << "CSpectral::DeriveCorrelation() failed: One of the input images is empty" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00100                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00101                 return false;
00102         }
00103         CComplexImage CLg, CSm, CBuf;
00104         int W=1;
00105         int H=1;
00106         int x,y;
00107         int wL=Lg.GetWidth();
00108         int hL=Lg.GetHeight();
00109         Dest.Alloc(wL,hL);
00110         while (W<=wL)
00111                 W*=2;
00112         while (H<=hL)
00113                 H*=2;
00114         int wS=Sm.GetWidth();
00115         int hS=Sm.GetHeight();
00116         CLg.Alloc(W,H);
00117         CSm.Alloc(W,H);
00118         float sum;
00119         sum=0;
00120         for (x=0;x<wL;x++)
00121                 for (y=0;y<hL;y++)
00122                         sum+=Lg.GetPixelFast(x,y);
00123 
00124         sum/=wL*hL;
00125         CLg.Flush(sum,0);
00126         for (x=0;x<wL;x++)
00127                 for (y=0;y<hL;y++)
00128                         CLg.SetPixelFastRe(x,y,Lg.GetPixelFast(x,y));
00129                 
00130         sum=0;
00131         for (x=0;x<wS;x++)
00132                 for (y=0;y<hS;y++)
00133                         sum+=Sm.GetPixelFast(x,y);
00134         
00135         sum/=wS*hS;
00136         CSm.Flush(sum,0);
00137         
00138         for (x=0;x<wS;x++)
00139                 for (y=0;y<hS;y++)              
00140                         CSm.SetPixelFastRe(x,y,Sm.GetPixelFast(x,y));
00141                                 
00142         FFTForward(CLg);
00143         FFTForward(CSm);
00144         CLg.CCFactorAndMultiply(CSm);
00145         FFTInverse(CLg);
00146         for (x=0;x<wL;x++)
00147         {
00148                 for (y=0;y<hL;y++)
00149                 {
00150                         Dest.SetPixelFast(x,y,CLg.GetPixelFastRe(x,y));
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         return true;
00154 }
00155
